mapper.select: SELECT A.RES_NM, A.EMP_ID, A.PAT_ID, A.RES_TYPE, A.RES_MEMO, A.RES_TITLE, A.RES_CONT, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as resStartDate, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as resTime, A.RES_ALLDAY, A.RES_COLOR, B.PAT_NAME, C.EMP_NAME, d.mem_tel FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PAT_ID = B.PAT_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER D ON B.MEM_ID = D.MEM_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') ORDER BY resStartDate,resTime

SELECT A.RES_NM, A.EMP_ID, A.PAT_ID, A.RES_TYPE, A.RES_MEMO, A.RES_TITLE, A.RES_CONT, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as resStartDate, TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'HH24:MI') as resTime, A.RES_ALLDAY, A.RES_COLOR, B.PAT_NAME, C.EMP_NAME, d.mem_tel FROM RESERVATION A LEFT JOIN PATIENT B ON A.PAT_ID = B.PAT_ID LEFT JOIN MEMBER D ON B.MEM_ID = D.MEM_ID JOIN EMPLOYEES C ON A.EMP_ID = C.EMP_ID WHERE TO_CHAR(A.RES_START_DATE, 'yyyy-mm-dd') >= to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd') AND C.EMP_ID=#{empId} ORDER BY resStartDate, resTime
